wait.name: wait
wait.description: It makes the bot to wait some time

look_right.name: look_right
look_right.description: It makes the bot to look right

look_left.name: look_left
look_left.description: It makes the bot to look left

walk.name: walk
walk.description: It makes the bot to walk in the direction it is looking at

jump_up.name: jump_up
jump_up.description: It makes the bot to jump up

jump_up_diag.name: jump_up_diag
jump_up_diag.description: It makes the bot to jump diagonally according its looking direction

ladder_up.name: ladder_up
ladder_up.description: It makes the bot to climb a ladder

ladder_down.name: ladder_down
ladder_down.description: It makes the bot to climb down a ladder

do_action.name: do_action
do_action.description: It makes the bot to execute the action in front of it

repeat.name: repeat
repeat.description: It makes the bot to repeat the actions inside the repeat block

if.name: if
if.description: Allows the bot to check if the cell in front of it fulfills the condition. If it does, it will execute the actions inside the if block. If it doesn't, it will execute the actions inside the else block

repeat_until.name: repeat_until
repeat_until.description: It makes the bot to repeat the actions inside the repeat block until the cell in front of it fulfills the condition

is_wall.name: is_wall
is_wall.description: Checks if the cell in front of the bot is a wall

is_ladder.name: is_ladder
is_ladder.description: Checks if the cell in front of the bot is a ladder

is_empty.name: is_empty
is_empty.description: Checks if the cell in front of the bot is empty

is_enemy.name: is_enemy
is_enemy.description: Checks if the cell in front of the bot is an enemy

is_energy.name: is_energy
is_energy.description: Checks if the cell in front of the bot is an energy

is_key.name: is_key
is_key.description: Checks if the cell in front of the bot is a key

is_door.name: is_door
is_door.description: Checks if the cell in front of the bot is a door

is_closed_door.name: is_closed_door
is_closed_door.description: Checks if the cell in front of the bot is a closed door

is_open_door.name: is_open_door
is_open_door.description: Checks if the cell in front of the bot is an open door
